name: get_installed_apps
description: Gets the list of installed applications on the device.

name: open_app
description: Opens the requested application on the device, falling back to any available clock app as a less-preferred option for 'alarms' or 'timers' if no direct match exists.

app_name.description: The name of the application to open, which must exactly match a name from `get_installed_apps`.

app_package_name.description: The package name of the application to open.

extras.description: A JSON string of extras to send to the opened application, used only for "Pixel Screenshots" and containing a "query" key whose value is the extracted information-seeking part of the user prompt, preferably a full question or sentence.

name: open_camera
description: Opens the device's camera, allowing specification of camera type (e.g., front or rear) and initial mode (e.g., photo or video).

camera_type.description: The type of camera to open, selected from 'FRONT', 'REAR', or 'DEFAULT'.

camera_operation.description: The initial functional mode for the camera upon opening, either 'PHOTO' or 'VIDEO'.

camera_mode.description: A deprecated parameter kept for binary compatibility.

name: open_home_screen
description: Navigate to the home screen on the device.

name: open_url
description: Opens the requested URL in a browser, intended for use only when the user prompt contains a URL or explicitly asks to open a website.

url.description: The URL to open; do not include the protocol (e.g., `https://`) if the user prompt does not.

website_name.description: The name of the website to open, excluding the top-level domain.

name: open_websearch
description: Opens a Google search page with the query in the browser.

query.description: A search query string to open.

name: power_off_device
description: Opens the power options menu on the device.

name: record_video
description: Records a video using the device camera, ignoring any requested delay and starting immediately.

camera_type.description: The type of camera to use; choose from 'FRONT', 'REAR', or 'DEFAULT'.

self_timer_delay.description: Deprecated and kept for binary compatibility.

video_duration.description: The video recording duration, provided as a string like 'record a 15 second video'.

name: restart_device
description: Restarts the device by opening the power options menu.

name: ring_phone
description: Remotely rings the user's paired phone via the device.

name: take_photo
description: Takes a photo using the device camera.

camera_type.description: The camera type to open, selectable from 'FRONT', 'REAR', or 'DEFAULT'; use 'FRONT' for selfies.

self_timer_delay.description: Delay time before taking a photo; defaults to '3 seconds' if not specified.

camera_mode.description: The camera mode for taking a picture; valid values are 'DEFAULT' or 'PORTRAIT'.

name: take_screenshot
description: Takes a screenshot on the device.
